The Future of Being Human

Experts predict significant changes in people's ways of thinking, being, and doing as they adapt to the age of AI. Concerns are raised about how AI adoption will affect essential traits such as empathy, social/emotional intelligence, complex thinking, ability to act independently, and sense of purpose. However, some hope for AIs' influence on humans' curiosity, decision-making, and creativity.

AI empathy social/emotional intelligence complex thinking independence purpose curiosity decision-making creativity artificial intelligence
